tool_description: Find places nearby a given coordinates.
name: Places Nearby a Coordinates
title: Places Nearby a Coordinates

api_list.name: Categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://places-nearby-a-coordinates.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "places-nearby-a-coordinates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://places-nearby-a-coordinates.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "places-nearby-a-coordinates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Nearby
api_list.description:
Returns nearby places sorted by distance from the origin coordinates in ascending order.

Returns up to 60 places per request.
